member.summary: Limit options supported by PostgreSQL.
member.remarks: This is a strict subset of LimitOptions

member.name: F:Tortuga.Chain.MySqlLimitOption.None
member.summary: No limits were applied.

member.name: F:Tortuga.Chain.MySqlLimitOption.Rows
member.summary: Returns the indicated number of rows with optional offset

member.name: F:Tortuga.Chain.MySqlLimitOption.RandomSampleRows
member.summary: Randomly sample the indicated number of rows
member.remarks: WARNING: This uses "ORDER BY RAND()", which is inappropriate for large tables.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.DefaultSchema
member.summary: Returns the user's default schema.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetIndexesForTable(Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the indexes for a table.
member.remarks: This should be cached on a TableOrViewMetadata object.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetScalarFunction(Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for a scalar function.
member.returns: Null if the object could not be found.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetScalarFunctions
member.summary: Gets the scalar functions that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all scalar functions were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetStoredProcedure(Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the stored procedure's metadata.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetStoredProcedures
member.summary: Gets the stored procedures that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all stored procedures were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetTableOrView(Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlObjectName)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for a table.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetTablesAndViews
member.summary: Gets the tables and views that were loaded by this cache.
member.remarks: Call Preload before invoking this method to ensure that all tables and views were loaded from the database's schema. Otherwise only the objects that were actually used thus far will be returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.Preload
member.summary: Preloads all of the metadata for this data source.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.PreloadScalarFunctions
member.summary: Preloads the scalar functions.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.PreloadStoredProcedures
member.summary: Preloads the table value functions.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.PreloadTables
member.summary: Preloads the metadata for all tables.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.PreloadViews
member.summary: Preloads the metadata for all views.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.Reset
member.summary: Resets the metadata cache, clearing out all cached metadata.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.ValueToSqlValue(System.Object,System.Nullable{MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlDbType})
member.summary: Converts a value to a string suitable for use in a SQL statement.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.ParseObjectName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parse a string and return the database specific representation of the object name.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.SqlTypeNameToDbType(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Determines the database column type from the column type name.
member.param: Name of the database column type.
Indicates whether or not the column is unsigned. Only applicable to some databases.
member.remarks: This does not honor registered types. This is only used for the database's hard-coded list of native types.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.ToClrType(MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlDbType,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns the CLR type that matches the indicated database column type.
member.param: If nullable, Nullable versions of primitive types are returned.
Optional length. Used to distinguish between a char and string. Defaults to string.
member.returns: A CLR type or NULL if the type is unknown.
member.remarks: This does not take into consideration registered types.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.GetColumns(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the columns.
member.remarks: WARNING: Only call this with verified table names. Otherwise a SQL injection attack can occur.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlMetadataCache.MaxParameters
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of parameters in a single SQL batch.
member.remarks: https://stackoverflow.com/a/6582902/5274

member.summary: Gets the database metadata.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlOpenDataSource.ExtensionCache
member.summary: The extension cache is used by extensions to store data source specific information.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlOpenDataSource.Close
member.summary: Closes the connection and transaction associated with this data source.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlOpenDataSource.GetExtensionData``1
member.summary: Gets the extension data.
member.typeparam: The type of extension data desired.
member.remarks: Chain extensions can use this to store data source specific data. The key should be a data type defined by the extension. Transactional data sources should override this method and return the value held by their parent data source.

member.summary: Tests the connection.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlOpenDataSource.TestConnectionAsync
member.summary: Tests the connection asynchronously.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlOpenDataSource.TryCommit
member.summary: Tries the commit the transaction associated with this data source.
member.returns: True if there was an open transaction associated with this data source, otherwise false.

member.summary: Modifies this data source with additional audit rules.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.MySql.MySqlOpenDataSource.WithUser(System.Object)
